org.openide.text

Class DataEditorSupport.Env

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openide.loaders.OpenSupport.Env
      • org.openide.text.DataEditorSupport.Env
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeListener, VetoableChangeListener, Serializable, EventListener, CloneableEditorSupport.Env, CloneableOpenSupport.Env
    Enclosing class:
    DataEditorSupport

    public abstract static class DataEditorSupport.Env
extends OpenSupport.Env
implements CloneableEditorSupport.Env
    Environment that connects the data object and the CloneableEditorSupport.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void changeFile()
      Method that allows subclasses to notify this environment that the file associated with this support has changed and that the environment should listen on modifications of different file object.

      Getter for file associated with this environment.
      String getMimeType()
      Mime type of the document.
      Date getTime()
      The time when the data has been modified

      Obtains the input stream.
      void markModified()
      First of all tries to lock the primary file and if it succeeds it marks the data object modified.
      OutputStream outputStream()
      Obtains the output stream.
      protected abstract FileLock takeLock()
      Locks the file.
      void unmarkModified()
      Reverse method that can be called to make the environment unmodified.

      • markModified

        public void markModified()
                  throws IOException
        First of all tries to lock the primary file and if it succeeds it marks the data object modified.

        Note: There is a contract (better saying a curse) that this method has to call takeLock() method in order to keep working some special filesystem's feature. See issue #28212.

        Specified by:
        markModified in interface CloneableOpenSupport.Env
        Overrides:
        markModified in class OpenSupport.Env
        Throws:
        IOException - if the environment cannot be marked modified (for example when the file is readonly), when such exception is the support should discard all previous changes
        See Also:
        FileObject.isReadOnly()

      • unmarkModified

        public void unmarkModified()
        Reverse method that can be called to make the environment unmodified.
        Specified by:
        unmarkModified in interface CloneableOpenSupport.Env
        Overrides:
        unmarkModified in class OpenSupport.Env
